title: ETEVON Women's Casual Crystal Quartz Leather Watch with Black Dial and Rose Gold Stainless Steel Case, Simple Dress Wrist Watches for Women Ladies
feature: ❤CLASSIC ELEGANT DESIGN❤ The classic elegant watch features with glossy bezel and rose gold watch hand . The mysterious black dial with four luxury crystal marker. Perfect for all kind of business, casual, indoor activities and daily use
❤IDEAL GIFTS FOR WOMEN❤ Comes in an elaborate luxury gift box. No extra wrapping needed. Perfect fashion gift to your girlfriend and wife, etc.
❤WATER RESISTANT FOR DAILY USE❤ 98FT(30M) water resistant, hand-wash, splashing and raining are all No Problem. NOTE: Please DO NOT PULL OUT the crown under water
❤HIGH QUALITY COMPONENTS❤ Japanese quartz movement provides precise and accurate time keeping. Japanese long-usage battery, scratch-resistant mineral watch face, stainless steel back case etc.
❤ETEVON SERVICES❤ 90 days money back guarantee for any reasons + 12 months replacement or full refund for quality issues + 24 months maintenance for quality issues
description: ETEVON, as an innovative pioneer in the industry, is committed to provide people the watches of quality and style, with advancing design philosophy based on a well equipped factory. Every single piece is made of firm and properly selected materials, imported movement, hardlex window glass and comfortable band. Above all, ETEVON watch will surely be a trustworthy partner in your daily life. 1.Elegant Dial Design : The rose gold watch hands and luxury crystal markers, stylish and fashionable. 2.Classic Simple Surface : The mysterious black dial surface with glossy rose gold-toned bezel, just like the deep universe on your wrist. 3.Classic Leather Strap : Soft and thick leather, comfortable and durable to wear.4.Water Resistant for Daily Use : In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming.5.Fashion Dress Matching : The elegant watch is fitted for different styles of dress. Perfect for all kind of business, casual, indoor and outdoor activities. Please DO NOT PULL OUT any button in the water 2. If mist or droplets found inside watch surface, please contact manufacturer immediately 3.
